May I ping #17716? The corresponding mathlib4 PR is ready to go, and I think it's better to do similar modifications sooner than later.

The goal of #17716 is to introduce a class is_cancel_mul_zero do redefine docs#is_domain imposing a cancellative multiplication (this is equivalent for rings, but not for semirings, and we have at least one interesting example for semirings, ideal R). Thanks!
